channel.title: Surface Tension: TOW missile unusable
channel.description: In the upstairs room with the TOW missile, I find that the smoke/dust from the tank gun impacts reduces frame rate down to about one per second, and the controls become unfeasibly sluggish. The smoke/slowtime takes ages to clear, by which time the tank has fired again. Fortunately, the tank can be taken out much more easily by one or two RPGs.

item.title: Surface Tension: TOW missile unusable
item.dc:creator: TrevorMag
item.description:
After upgrading to a more credibly powered machine, this problem is solved.

Read full topic

In the upstairs room with the TOW missile, I find that the smoke/dust from the tank gun impacts reduces frame rate down to about one per second, and the controls become unfeasibly sluggish. The smoke/slowtime takes ages to clear, by which time the tank has fired again.
